name: Spell Focus
text: Choose a school of magic. Any spells you cast of that school are more difficult to resist.
benefit: Add +1 to the Difficulty Class for all saving throws against spells from the school of magic you select.
special: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new school of magic.
mythicText: Your magical specialties are particularly effective.
mythicBenefit: Choose a school of magic you already have Spell Focus in. The bonus to save DCs provided by Spell Focus and Greater Spell Focus for that school increases by 1. You can expend one use of mythic power as part of casting a spell from your chosen school to force any of the spell’s targets to roll their saving throws twice, taking the lower result.
mythicSpecial: You can gain this feat multiple times. The effects do not stack. Each time you take this feat, it applies to a different non-mythic Spell Focus feat.
text_zh: 选择一种魔法学派。你施展的该学派法术更难抵抗。
benefit_zh: 所有对抗你选定魔法学派的法术的豁免检定DC+1。
special_zh: 你可以多次选取此专长。其效果不叠加。每次你获得此专长时，它作用于一种新的魔法学派。
mythicText_zh: 你所精研的法术极为有效。
mythicBenefit_zh: 从你已经具有法术专攻专长的学派中选取一个。法术专攻与高等法术专攻专长对该法术的DC加值增加1点。你能够将花费1次神话之力作为施放所选学派法术的一部分，以此迫使任何法术目标要投掷两次豁免并取较低的结果。
mythicSpecial_zh: 你能够多次选取该专长。其效果不会叠加。每当你选取该专长时，它都会应用到不同的非神话版法术专攻专长上。
